content.rendered:
Sabah Air Aviation Sdn Bhd (SAA) is the pioneer Helicopter Companies in Malaysia. The company started operations since 1975 and is today a leading provider of un-scheduled rotary and fixed wing services in the country. Sabah Air Aviation Sdn. Bhd. is one of the oldest General Aviation Companies in Malaysia.

 

Sabah Air Aviation Offices in Malaysia

Kota Kinabalu – HQ
Subang
Sandakan
Tawau
Ipoh

Find Sabah Air Aviation Reservation | Town | Sales | Airport Offices Contact details such as Address, Phone number, Location, Email and more details in your country
